objects.name: CongString
objects.string: Congratulations on finding all the artifacts

objects.name: Content
objects.string: A Toy cast in fine clay, made using clay wheels and trolley for containing goods, and wooden shafts. The toy cart consist of two wheels with hubs, a trolley shaped like a bowl with a rectangular frame and two projections on its underside to attach it to the axel, a wooden shaft, draw-shaft etc.

objects.name: Content
objects.string: She represents a very thin woman standing with her right hand on the back of her hip and left hand resting on her left thigh, just above the knee. Her arms are unnaturally long. Her head is tilted back, and she has a defiant, nonchalant air about her. Her hair is swept back in a low, loose bun at the nape of her neck.

objects.name: Content
objects.string: The battle-axe is inscribed with Quranic verses and 'SahibeQiran Nadir' in Arabic.

objects.name: info
objects.string:
Mathura, UP. 
5th century CE. Gupta period

objects.name: Content
objects.string: This is a standing figure of Vishnu, he wears an elaborate crown with mauli- mani on his head, a necklace, yajnopavita and a beautiful vanamala.

objects.name: NewText
objects.string: Press Any key to start playing

objects.name: NewText2
objects.string: Arrow right to move player right

objects.name: NewText22
objects.string: Arrow left to move player left

objects.name: NewText222
objects.string: Arrow up to move up the ladder

objects.name: NewText2222
objects.string: Arrow down to pick up the artifact with "?" sign
